text: Evgeny Yuryevich Matveev () (born Penza, 15 April 1984) is a Russian rugby union player. He plays as a hooker and as a flanker. He plays for VVA Saracens. He has 55 caps for Russia, since 2007, with 10 tries scored, 50 points on aggregate. He was called for the 2011 Rugby World Cup, playing in two games and without scoring. He was a regular player in the Russia side that qualified for the 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan.Evgeny Matveev International Statistics ==References== ==External links== *Evgeny Matveev International Statistics Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Russian rugby union players Category:Russia international rugby union players Category:VVA Saracens players Category:Rugby union hookers Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Sportspeople from Penza
title: Evgeny Matveev (rugby)
